title: Apple Music’s 100 Best Albums
content:
Chosen by members of the Apple Music teams and a panel of experts (including Pharrell & Charli XCX), this is their list of the 100 Best Albums of all time (see also a text listing on Wikipedia). Itâ€™s an interesting list, worthy of argument and comparison to Rolling Stoneâ€™s list. Hereâ€™s the top 10:

1. The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill by Lauryn Hill
2. Thriller by Michael Jackson
3. Abbey Road by The Beatles
4. Purple Rain by Prince & The Revolution
5. Blonde by Frank Ocean
6. Songs in the Key of Life by Stevie Wonder
7. Good Kid, M.A.A.D City by Kendrick Lamar
8. Back to Black by Amy Winehouse
9. Nevermind by Nirvana
10. Lemonade by BeyoncÃ©

You can stream all 100 albums on Apple Music and (unofficially, cheekily) on Spotify.
